    • Constructor Detail

      • ExpressionMap

        public ExpressionMap(lexa.core.data.DataSet map)
              throws ExpressionException
        Create a new expression map.
        The map is built from the contents of the DataSet. The content may be either strings or embeded maps.
        Parameters:
        map - the definitions for the expression map
        Throws:
        ExpressionException - when an error occurs passing an expression.

      • ExpressionMap

        public ExpressionMap(lexa.core.data.DataSet map,
                     FunctionLibrary library)
              throws ExpressionException
        Create a new expression map.
        The map is built from the contents of the DataSet. The content may be either strings or embeded maps.
        Parameters:
        map - the definitions for the expression map
        library - the library for evaluation the expressions
        Throws:
        ExpressionException - when an error occurs passing an expression.

    • Method Detail

      • evaluate

        public java.lang.Object evaluate(java.lang.String key,
                                 MapDataSet data)
                          throws ExpressionException
        Evaluate an expression from the map
        Parameters:
        key - the name of the expression
        data - the input data for the expression
        Returns:
        the result of the expression.
        Throws:
        ExpressionException - when an error occurs adding the function
